00049 /*
00050  * class TREX::europa::TokenFilter
00051  */
00052 
00053 // structors 
00054 
00055 TokenFilter::TokenFilter(EUROPA::TiXmlElement const &cfg)
00056   :EUROPA::SOLVERS::FlawFilter(cfg, true), m_assembly(NULL) {}
00057 
00058 // observers
00059 
00060 Assembly const &TokenFilter::assembly() const {
00061   if( !have_assembly() )
00062     throw EuropaException("TokenFilter not attached to a TREX assembly");
00063   return *m_assembly;
00064 }
00065 
00066 // modifiers 
00067 
00068 void TokenFilter::set_assembly(EUROPA::EngineComponentId const &component) {
00069   if( !have_assembly() && component.isId() )
00070     m_assembly = &details::assembly(component);
00071 }
00072 
00073 // manipulators
00074 
00075 bool TokenFilter::tokenCheck(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00076   return  assembly().isIgnored(token) ||
00077           token->start()->getLowerBound() >= assembly().final() ||
00078           token->end()->getUpperBound() <= assembly().initial() ||
00079           doTest(token);
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 bool TokenFilter::test(EUROPA::EntityId const &entity) {
00084   EUROPA::TokenId token;
00085 
00086   if( EUROPA::TokenId::convertable(entity) ) {
00087     token = EUROPA::TokenId(entity);
00088     set_assembly(token->getPlanDatabase());
00089   } else if( EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId::convertable(entity) ) {
00090     EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId var(entity);
00091     set_assembly(var->getConstraintEngine());
00092     
00093     token = details::parent_token(var);
00094   }
00095   return token.isId() && tokenCheck(token);
00096 }
00097 
00098 /*
00099  * class TREX::europa::DeliberationFilter
00100  */
00101 
00102 // manipulators 
00103 
00104 bool DeliberationFilter::doTest(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00105   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain const &t_start(token->start()->lastDomain());
00106   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain const &t_end(token->end()->lastDomain());
00107   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain const &horizon = assembly().horizon();
00108   
00109   return t_start.getLowerBound()>=horizon.getUpperBound() 
00110       || t_end.getUpperBound()<=horizon.getLowerBound();
00111 }
00112 
00113 /*
00114  * class TREX::europa::SynchronizationFilter
00115  */
00116 
00117 // manipulators 
00118 
00119 bool SynchronizationFilter::doTest(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00120   if( assembly().in_synchronization() ) {
00121     EUROPA::eint cur = assembly().now();
00122     bool overlaps_now(token->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur 
00123                       && token->end()->lastDomain().getLowerBound()>=cur);
00124     
00125     return !overlaps_now;
00126   } 
00127   return false; // No filtering outside of synchronization
00128 }
